title: Equipping Your Kids to Resist Pornography
itunes:summary:
Josh Glaser and Daniel Weiss describe why “the talk” about abstinence isn’t enough to guide your kids in our pornographic world. They offer wise habits and guidelines for technology use.

Receive the book "Treading Boldly" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-08-15?refcd=1453704&treatment=one-time-gift

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/equipping-your-kid-to-resist-pornography/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
